snippet: “No Good Deed” stars Idris Elba as an escaped convict with a violent history against women, invading the house of a stay-at-home mother.
abstract: Ben Kenigsberg reviews movie No Good Deed, directed by Sam Miller and starring Idris Elba.
lead_paragraph: “No Good Deed” stars Idris Elba as an escaped convict with a violent history against women, invading the house of a stay-at-home mother.

headline.print_headline: A Violent Tale Induces a Familiar Flinch
headline.seo: ‘No Good Deed’ Stars Idris Elba as an Escaped Felon
headline.main: A Violent Tale Induces a Familiar Flinch
